question: This country Successfully Test-Fires Dhanush Missile recently.
explanation: India successfully test-fired the nuclear-capable surface-to-surface Dhanush ballistic missile with a strike range of 350 km from a naval ship off Odisha coast. This naval variant of the indigenously-developed Prithvi-II missile was test-fired from the ship positioned near Paradip in the Bay of Bengal. It was developed bt the Defence Research and Development Organisation. 'Dhanush' missile is is capable of carrying a payload of 500 kg and hitting both land and sea-based targets.
